General.Name: Jiangsu Liance Electromechanical Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Jiangsu Liance Electromechanical Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of power system intelligent test equipment in China. The company offers dynamometers, control instruments, automatic engine test systems and supporting equipment, spare parts, and other machinery. It also provides power system testing and verification services, as well as computer software development services. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Qidong, China.
